full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Truck, Medium with Van Body

#### Tender Details

| **Field** | **Value** | **Language** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Title | RFP 6D012-225241 Truck, Medium with Van Body | English |
| Title (French) | DP 6D012-225241 Camion moyen à carrosserie-fourgon | French |
| Reference Number | WS3779733817-Doc3781355482 | English |
| Amendment Number | 0 | English |
| Solicitation Number | WS3779733817 | English |
| Publication Date | December 20, 2022 | English |
| Tender Closing Date | January 19, 2023, 14:00:00 EST | English |
| Amendment Date | December 20, 2022 | English |

#### Tender Description

Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking one (1) Truck, Medium with Van Body to be delivered to Ottawa, ON, Canada.

* The bid submission deadline has been amended to 2:00 pm EST on January 19, 2023.
* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by this deadline.
* Bids submitted after 2:00 pm EST will be deemed non-responsive.

#### Tender Requirements

* The Truck, Medium with Van Body must comply with the terms and conditions outlined in the tender documents.
* The delivery location for the vehicle is Ottawa, ON, Canada.

#### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Contact Information

* Name: Jacques Legault (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: jacques.legault@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: Not available
* Fax: Not available

#### Online Notice

The original posting can be accessed at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14942072?extsite=MTQ5NDIwNzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14942072?extsite=MTQ5ND
